video_prompt: Character's red eyes subtly shift focus. Ripples expand from submerged feet. Subtle glows emanate from hair and dress patterns, creating a gentle shimmer. The background subtly distorts as the camera's focus adjusts.
image_prompt: Anime character, purple hair, cat ears, red eyes, black dress with purple patterns, knee-length, white legs with purple thigh and calf patterns. Holds a spear with a large purple blade. Predominantly black and white with purple and blue accents. Glowing purple hair and clothes. Narrow depth of field, blurred background. Standing in dark water with ripples, ankle-deep. Monochromatic dark forest background with tall trees. Dramatic lighting, bright glow from character, strong contrast. Calm, cool, mystical, otherworldly. Bright glows from character, water, and ripples. Artistic, unique color scheme, enchanting, magical world.
refined_video_prompt: Eyes subtly shift focus. Ripples expand from submerged feet. Hair and dress patterns glow, shimmering. Background distorts, re-focusing.
